articles.author: Alessandro Ford
articles.title: Wales is getting the first Black leader in Europe - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Vaughan Gething set to become First Minister after winning Welsh Labour leadership contest.
articles.content: Today, we turn a page in the book of our nations history. A history we write together. Not just because I have the honour of becoming the first Black leader in any European country but because the ge… [+650 chars]
